title: BRIEF-Everspin Signs Long-Term Patent License Agreement With Alps Electric
text: March 19, 2018 / 12:08 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Everspin Signs Long-Term Patent License Agreement With Alps Electric Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Alps Electric Co Ltd: * EVERSPIN SIGNS LONG-TERM PATENT LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH ALPS ELECTRIC * EVERSPIN TECHNOLOGIES INC - ‍SPECIFIC FINANCIAL TERMS OF AGREEMENT ARE NOT BEING DISCLOSED.​ * EVERSPIN TECHNOLOGIES -CO, ALPS TO MUTUALLY GRANT LICENSES TO MAGNETORESISTIVE-BASED 3D SENSOR PATENT PORTFOLIOS FOR MAGNETORESISTIVE SENSOR PRODUCTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
